titles.title: To require that all Government records that contain information bearing on the last flight and disappearance of Amelia Earhart be transmitted to the Library of Congress and made available to the public.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Operations.
Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Libraries and Memorials.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Information, Justice, Transportation and Agriculture.

bill.summary: 6/29/1993--Introduced. Directs executive agency heads to: (1) search their agency records to identify information relevant to the last flight and disappearance of Amelia Earhart; and (2) transmit it to the Library of Congress, where it shall be made public.
